Ingredients.4: 1 tablespoon minced fresh chives, plus more for garnish

Ingredients.7: 0.5 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

Directions.1: Combine eggs and mustard in a bowl; stir until well blended. Mix in Parmesan cheese, chives, garlic, salt, and pepper.

Directions.2: Add chopped broccoli and shredded carrots; stir until ingredients are evenly mixed together.

Directions.3: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Directions.4: Divide vegetable mixture into 8 equal portions and shape into 3 inch patties. Add to the hot oil in the skillet and cook until brown, 3 to 4 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low, turn broccoli patties, and cook until brown, 3 to 4 more minutes.

Directions.5: Place patties on a warm serving platter and garnish with additional fresh chives, if desired. Serve immediately.
